# List of British divisions in the First World War

{| class= "wikitable floatright"
|+Key
|-
!Regular Army
|align=center bgcolor=#bbddbb|Green
|-
!Territorial Force
|align=center bgcolor=#bbbbdd|Blue
|-
!Yeomanry
|align=center bgcolor=#dbdbbb|Yellow
|-
!New Army
|align=center bgcolor=#ddbbbb|Red
|-
!Other
|align=center bgcolor=#cccccc|Grey
|}
List of military divisions — List of British divisions in the First World War
This page is a list of British divisions that existed in the First World War. Divisions were either infantry or cavalry. Divisions were categorised as being 'Regular Army' (professional), 'Territorial Force' (part-time) or 'New Army' (wartime). The 'Territorial' cavalry was referred to as Yeomanry.

{| border=0 cellpadding=2
|-
|width=10 bgcolor=#bbddbb|

|2nd Cavalry Division

|bgcolor=#bbddbb|
|3rd Cavalry Division
|-
|bgcolor=#dbdbbb|
|1st Mounted Division - renamed 1st Cyclist Division in July 1916 then broken up in November 1916
|-
|bgcolor=#dbdbbb|
|2nd Mounted Division - broken up in January 1916
|-
|bgcolor=#dbdbbb|
|2/2nd Mounted Division - renamed 3rd Mounted Division in March 1916, 1st Mounted Division in July 1916, then The Cyclist Division in September 1917
|-
|bgcolor=#dbdbbb|
|4th Mounted Division - renamed 2nd Cyclist Division in July 1916, then broken up in November 1916
|-
|bgcolor=#dbdbbb|
|Yeomanry Mounted Division - renamed 1st Mounted Division in April 1918 then 4th Cavalry Division in July 1918
|}

* List of Indian divisions in World War I
Sources
* Maj A.F. Becke,History of the Great War: Order of Battle of Divisions, Part 1: The Regular British Divisions, London: HM Stationery Office, 1934/Uckfield: Naval & Military Press, 2007, ISBN 1-847347-38-X.
* Maj A.F. Becke,History of the Great War: Order of Battle of Divisions, Part 2a: The Territorial Force Mounted Divisions and the 1st-Line Territorial Force Divisions (42–56), London: HM Stationery Office, 1935/Uckfield: Naval & Military Press, 2007, ISBN 1-847347-39-8.
* Maj A.F. Becke,History of the Great War: Order of Battle of Divisions, Part 2b: The 2nd-Line Territorial Force Divisions (57th–69th), with the Home-Service Divisions (71st–73rd) and 74th and 75th Divisions, London: HM Stationery Office, 1937/Uckfield: Naval & Military Press, 2007, ISBN 1-847347-39-8.
* Maj A.F. Becke,History of the Great War: Order of Battle of Divisions, Part 3a: New Army Divisions (9–26), London: HM Stationery Office, 1938/Uckfield: Naval & Military Press, 2007, ISBN 1-847347-41-X.
* Maj A.F. Becke,History of the Great War: Order of Battle of Divisions, Part 3b: New Army Divisions (30–41) and 63rd (R.N.) Division, London: HM Stationery Office, 1939/Uckfield: Naval & Military Press, 2007, ISBN 1-847347-41-X.
External links
*[http://www.longlongtrail.co.uk/army/order-of-battle-of-divisions/ Order of Battle of Divisions at The Long, Long Trail.]
